definition: house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The ceiling, elevating flooring, eaves and color steel door are optional for customer.
sentences.chinese: 屋面，樓面，屋檐和彩鋼門可由客戶選擇。

sentences.english: There are five floors of shops and each of floor is very big.
sentences.chinese: 有五層樓的商店，且每層樓面都很大。

sentences.english: Prestressed concrete hollow-core slab is a widely used structural element.
sentences.chinese: 預應力圓孔板是被廣泛採用的一種樓面構件。

sentences.english: Can three-layer floors, adopt the freight elevator for lifting.
sentences.chinese: 可三層樓面，採用貨梯升降。

sentences.english: All timber floors are covered with floor boarding, described later.
sentences.chinese: 所有的木樓面都用木板鋪蓋，詳述於後。

sentences.english: Office part ground and floor are the same to the dormitory's.
sentences.chinese: 辦公部分空中與樓面均同宿舍樓。

sentences.english: The floor-to-floor height in certain areas may differ due to different design requirements.
sentences.chinese: 部份樓面之樓層高度或會因應設計需要而有差異。

sentences.english: In this way, green parterre is elevated on the upper floors.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一來，綠色花壇就被提升至上層樓面。

sentences.english: It includes more than one hundred seventy-six million square meters of floor space.
sentences.chinese: 它包括超過一百七十六個萬平方米的樓面面積。

definition: to quote a price/seller's first offer
property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
